name: InactiveInterventionsRelatedToMedicationManagementMedicationActionPlan
title: (Inactive) Interventions Related to Medication Management, Medication Action Plan
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes that represent the creation or update of a medication action plan for patients to treat cardiovascular disorders.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Intervention

The intent of this data element is to document when providers create or update a medication action plan specifically for cardiovascular disorders.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent documentation of medication action plan.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that are not related to the documentation or update of a medication action plan.)

concept.display: Documentation of medication related action plan (procedure)
